channel.title: When u download a server how can u make so other people can join
channel.description: ok i downloaded a server opened it and did runserver now that im on how do i get others 2 join the ip must be left at 127.0.0.1

item.title: When u download a server how can u make so other people can join
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

First you have to forward the port your using with your server default is 43594 then you can get no-ip but you don’t need it then post your IP on the forums so people can connect…

Or your no-ip…

Read full topic
